ref_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
hyp_text: Princeton University and Uppsala University students who studied abroad in the United States and Sweden, respectively, reported that they were able to identify the new species after having seen it only twice, but they are not the only ones who think that it looks familiar. [English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

src_text: Biorhythm-based dang thlan theihah chuan thil tuihnang, abikin tui leh thingpui, mut hmaa in tam hian zunchhuakin a kaitho mai dawn che a ni.
ref_text: Other biorhythm-based options involve drinking lots of fluid (particularly water or tea, a known diuretic) prior to sleep, forcing one to get up to urinate.
hyp_text: The idea of using biorhythm-based predictions to determine the best time for doing things is flawed because it assumes that all people are alike in their biological rhythms and that all activities are alike in their effect on the body.

src_text: Tibetan meditation lairîl ber chu Deity Yoga a ni. Pathian hrang hrang mitthlana atang chuan chakna lakna hnar te chu tihfai an ni a, chakra (chakna lo chhuahna) chu tih nun a ni a, tichuan thlarau lama finna pek an ni thin a ni.
ref_text: The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.
hyp_text: The main type of Tibetan meditation is Deity Yoga. It involves visualizing the deities and their energies, and then channeling them into one's own body.

src_text: Khawvel indopui pahnihna lai chuan Germany chu hmelma ber a ni a, chu chuan USSR leh USA chu tang dun lo thei loin a siam bawk a. indo a zawh meuh chuan ram inrêlbawldan a inkalh ta fur mai a, chumi chuan ram chu nasa takin a tlakchhiattir a ni.
ref_text: Germany was a common enemy in World War 2, leading to cooperation between the USSR and USA. With the end of the war the clashes of system, process and culture led to the countries falling out.
hyp_text: Germany is the only country to have been a member of both the Axis and the Allies, and the only country to have been occupied by both the USSR and the USA. It has been divided into two states, East and West Germany, for almost half of the period since World War II.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Mizo]: Tuna Belgium hmun henkhat te hi a hma chuan Luxembourg a ni thin a, mahse Belgium Revolution, 1830 hnu atangin Belgium an lo ni ta hlawm a ni.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

hyp_text: Majorcan cuisine is similar to that of other Mediterranean countries, relying on olive oil, vegetables and fish (especially tuna), but the island also has a tradition of meat and game dishes.
